description: Bitcoin Asia 2025 will be held in Hong Kong on August 28-29, attracting 15,000 attendees and over 200 speakers, making it the world’s second-largest Bitcoin event. The conference highlights Asia’s growing role in digital assets, with Hong Kong emerging as a hub after approving spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs in 2024. Upcoming events include Bitcoin Amsterdam in November, Bitcoin MENA in December, and Bitcoin 2026 in Las Vegas next April
title: Bitcoin Asia 2025 in Hong Kong to Host Second-Largest BTC Event, Over 15,000 Attendees Expected

description: The Philippines is thinking about setting up a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve to help with its rising debt. Congressman Miguel Luis Villafuerte came up with the idea for the bill, which says that the government must buy 10,000 BTC over five years and hold it for 20 years, only using it to pay off debt. It comes after the US launched its reserves, while the UK and South Korea turned it down, and India is still thinking about it.
title: Philippine Lawmaker Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve to Tackle National Debt

description: Apple's Awe Dropping hardware launch event will be held on September 9. The company is expected to unveil the iPhone 17 series, including a new iPhone 17 Air model. These new phones are expected to be released a few days after the event. The Apple Watch Series 11 and AirPods Pro 3 may also be announced at the same event.
title: Apple 'Awe Dropping' Launch Event Set for September 9; iPhone 17 Series, Apple Watch Series 11, AirPods Pro 3 Expected

description: CloudSEK, a cybersecurity firm, highlighted that artificial intelligence (AI) summarising tools can be tricked into carrying out commands of threat actors using benign CSS tricks. These tricks usually involve using hidden text in emails, messages, weblinks, and web pages. When a user asks an AI chatbot or an AI summarising tool to process the content and provide a summary, it also processes the invisible text, which are typically prompt injections aimed at overwhelming the AI system.
title: CloudSEK Research Reveals How AI Summarising Tools Can Be Tricked Using Prompt Injection-Based Attacks

description: Perplexity, the Silicon Valley-based artificial intelligence (AI) startup, has reportedly expanded its revenue-sharing programme for publishers. As per the report, the company will now compensate media houses and website publishers when their content appears on the Comet web browser’s AI searches. The expansion follows last year’s announcement when the company first announced its revenue-sharing programme to pay publishers for surfacing their content on its AI answer engine platform.
title: Perplexity to Reportedly Expand Its Revenue Sharing Programme for Publishers to Comet Browser

description: Sony has sought to increase oversight and control over its studios in the aftermath of the costly failure of its live service game, Concord. The company is reportedly balancing the creative freedom of its studios' with more rigorous practices that help limit the impact of misfiring releases.
title: Sony Opts for Safeguards, Studio Oversight to Protect Itself From Concord-Like High-Profile Failures

description: With the Galaxy Watch8 Series, Samsung has built more than a sleep tracker. It is a sleep improvement system.
title: The Science of Sleep: How Samsung is Personalizing Rest for Better Days ft Galaxy Watch8 Series
Top 5 Things to Check Before Buying Term Insurance Online in 2025

description: Hisense UX ULED RGB-MiniLED TVs have been launched in 100-inch and 116-inch sizes with 4K UHD resolution, RGB Mini-LEDs, and 8,000 nits peak brightness. They support HDR10+, Dolby Vision IQ, Imax Enhanced, Pantone validation, MEMC, and a 165Hz Game Mode Ultra with VRR and FreeSync Premium Pro. Powered by the Hi-View AI Engine X and H7 processor, they feature a 6.2.2 CineStage X Surround system, VIDAA OS, and an eco-friendly solar-powered USB-C remote.
title: Hisense UX ULED RGB-MiniLED Series Launched in India in 110-Inch, 116-Inch Display Sizes

description: iQOO 15 Mini is tipped to launch as a competitor to the rumoured OnePlus 15T. The phone is said to be a compact model in the upcoming iQOO 15 series. The handset might feature a large battery. To pack a high-capacity battery, the company can use the silicon-carbon technology. However, since iQOO has not confirmed the launch of a compact, this information should be taken with a pinch of salt.
title: iQOO Working on Smartphone With 7,000mAh Battery, Small Display to Compete With OnePlus 15T, Tipster Claims

description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 4G has reportedly appeared on the Bluetooth SIG database, hinting at an imminent launch. Expected to debut later this year alongside the Tab A11+, it has also surfaced on multiple certification sites previously. The tablet may feature a 5,000mAh battery with 15W charging, dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and LTE support. A leaked image shows a portrait-oriented front camera.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 LTE Listed on Bluetooth SIG Website Hinting at Imminent Launch: Report

description: WhatsApp for Mac got a new update via the App Store. The latest update with version 25.22.79 reportedly introduces a chat filtering feature with Unread, Favourites and Group options. This is available to a limited group of users. The messaging service is is making it easier to see unread, favourite, and group chats on your Mac computer.
title: WhatsApp for macOS Updated With Chat Filtering Feature to Display Unread, Favourite, and Group Chats

description: Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro were launched earlier this year. Now, the Chinese smartphone maker could be gearing up to launch the purported successor of the series by the end of this year. Dubbed Honor 500 and 500 Pro, the lineup is tipped to feature some upgrades over its predecessor. Moreover, the rear camera module could be thinner, too.
title: Honor 500 Series Launch Timeline Tipped; Said to Feature 200-Megapixel Camera

description: Lenovo Legion Gen 10 gaming laptop series has been launched in India with four models. The Lenovo Legion Pro 7i, Legion Pro 5i, Legion 7i, and Legion 5i feature OLED displays with up to 240Hz refresh rate. The Lenovo Legion Pro 7i is the top-end model in the lineup, and it features up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX processor and Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPU.
title: Lenovo Legion Pro 7i, Legion 7i, Legion Pro 5i, Legion 5i Gaming Laptops With Up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPUs Debut in India

description: Spotify has announced, in a press release, that the company will start rolling out a new feature that will allow users to send direct messages to each other. Users will be able to recommend music, podcasts, and audiobooks to their family members and friends, and to people with whom they share a Family or Duo plan. Starting this week, the feature will be rolled out to select markets, and a wider rollout could be expected soon. However, the company has not revealed when the feature will be available in India.
title: Spotify Users Can Now Send Direct Messages to Each Other to Share Music, Podcasts

description: The Tamil comedy Do You Wanna Partner has created buzz with its trailer and fun-filled storyline. Fans are eagerly waiting to stream the film online, enjoying a mix of romance, quirky events, and laughter. Featuring Tamannaah Bhatia and Diana Penty, the movie is set to become a popular OTT release for Tamil audiences.
title: Do You Wanna Partner OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tamil Comedy Film Starring Tamannaah Bhatia and Diana Penty
Help Your Child Learn Better With Intel-Powered AI PCs

description: A number of Indian game developers and publishers announced an independent industry body on Tuesday. The Indian Game Publishers and Developers Association, launched after the Online Gaming Bill was passed in the Parliament, is also seeking a partnership with the Government of Maharashtra.
title: Indian Game Developers and Publishers Announce Industry Body After Parliament Passes Online Gaming Bill

description: Nvidia, on Monday, announced the general availability of its Jetson AGX Thor development kit and production modules. Jetson Thor is the successor to the Jetson Orin chipset, which arrived in September 2022. The latest robotics platform significantly improves on both processing power as well as energy efficiency, and the company claims that it can enable physical artificial intelligence (AI) and robots — in particular, humanoid robots — to have real-time, intelligent interactions with people and the physical world.
title: Nvidia’s Jetson AGX Thor Now Available, Brings Real-Time Smarts to Future Robots

description: Samsung Galaxy F17 5G and Galaxy M17 5G have appeared on Geekbench, both powered by the Exynos 1330 SoC with 8GB RAM and Android 15-based One UI 7. The F17 scored 975 and 2,242 points, while the M17 scored 762 and 1,596 points in single and multi-core tests, respectively. Both phones are expected to share similar features to the Galaxy A17 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy F17 5G, Galaxy M17 5G Spotted on Geekbench with Exynos 1330 Chip, Android 15

description: Xiaomi has introduced a limited-time battery replacement offer for its users in India. It is also providing free software upgrade, and free Device Health Check-Up for Xiaomi and Redmi branded smartphones in the country as part of its Care & Connect Service Week. Users can also avail free cleaning and sanitation of their devices.
title: Xiaomi's Care and Connect Service Week Brings Up to 50 Percent Discount on Battery Replacements

description: Asus Vivobook S14 and Vivobook 14 have been launched in India. The Taiwanese company has also unveiled two refreshed Vivobook 15 (2025) and Vivobook 14 (X1407CA) laptops with the 13th Gen Intel Core processors. The new laptops are currently available in India for customers on Amazon and the company’s official website. While the refreshed models are available on Flipkart and Asus’ online store.
title: Asus Vivobook 14 (2025), Vivobook S14 (2025) Launched in India With Up to AMD Ryzen AI 7 350 Processors

description: Hideo Kojima has said that he has already written the concept for Death Stranding 3. In a recent interview, the game designed said that he wasn't planning to work on the game at the moment, but had the concept for a potential third Death Stranding game "in data".
title: Hideo Kojima Has Already Written the Concept for Death Stranding 3, but Isn't Planning to Do It at the Moment

description: Inspector Zende is an upcoming Netflix original movie that is soon landing on your digital screens. The movie stars Manoj Bajpayee and Jim Sarbh in the lead roles. It revolves around supercop Zende, who has to chase and hunt down Bhojraj (Jim Sarbh), after his escape from Delhi prison.
title: Inspector Zende OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Manoj Bajpayee Starrer Movie Online

description: Oppo A6 5G and Oppo A6 Max 5G could launch in China as rebranded versions of Oppo F31 and Oppo F31 Pro+, respectively. The Oppo A6 5G with model number PLS120 has allegedly appeared on the TENAA website. The listing shows the device with a 6.57-inch display and a 6,830mAh rated battery.
title: Oppo A6, Oppo A6 Max Said to Debut as Rebranded Oppo F31, Oppo F31 Pro+; Key Specifications Tipped via TENAA Listing

description: The crypto market shed $200 billion after a whale dumped around 24,000 BTC, triggering $550 million in liquidations. Bitcoin plunged to near $110,000 while Ethereum briefly reached an all-time high near $4,900, boosted by $2.5 billion in ETF inflows this month. Altcoins like Solana, XRP, and Dogecoin also saw steep pullbacks. Analysts noted institutional accumulation of Bitcoin and Ether remains strong, with futures activity hitting new highs, suggesting resilience despite near-term volatility.
title: Crypto Market Plunges as Bitcoin Slides to Six-Week Low, Ethereum Stays Resilient

description: Google’s NotebookLM introduced Video Overviews last month, which can generate narrative-based visual slides based on the selected sources. On Monday, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced that the feature is now available in 80 languages globally. The expansion will now allow users to select sources that are not in the English language and then generate an AI-powered visual summary of the topic.
title: Google NotebookLM’s Video Overviews Expanded to 80 Languages, Audio Overviews Gets an Upgrade

description: OnePlus Nord Buds 3r, priced at Rs. 1,799, will go on sale in India from September 8 in Aura Blue and Ash Black shades. The earbuds feature 12.4mm titanium-coated drivers, and AI-powered dual-mic call noise cancellation. Connectivity includes Bluetooth 5.4, Google Fast Pair, dual-device support, and up to 47ms low-latency game mode. It also supports AI Translation, Find My Earbuds, and voice assistant access. With the case, it is said to offer a battery life of up to 54 hours.
title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3r Launched in India With IP55 Rating, 12.4mm Drivers: Price, Specifications

description: OpenAI Learning Accelerator, a new India-focused initiative, was introduced by the company on Monday. Through this initiative, the San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm aims to build advanced AI research, training, and deployment capabilities among the educators and learners of the country. The AI firm is also collaborating with various stakeholders and providing both funding and free ChatGPT licenses as part of the initiative.
title: OpenAI Learning Accelerator Introduced in India, Students and Teachers to Get 5 Lakh ChatGPT Licenses

description: The Oppo Find X9 series is said to be in development as the successor to the Oppo Find X8 series, which was announced in October 2024. A tipster has suggested that one of the models in the upcoming lineup – the Oppo Find X9 Pro – will come with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. The handset is tipped to be available in three colour options, and there will also be a special edition variant of the Oppo Find X9 Pro.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro to Feature Up to 16GB of RAM and Debut in Three Colourways, Tipster Claims

description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 and Galaxy S23 Ultra are now covered under the free one-time screen replacement policy. This limited-period offer applies to devices affected by the infamous green line issue. According to the company, the screen replacement policy is valid till September, and customers can visit Samsung authorised service centres in India to get their handsets looked at. However, there will be certain limitations on the eligibility of devices under the replacement policy.
title: Samsung Offers Free Screen Replacement for Galaxy S23, Galaxy S23 Ultra Affected by Green Line Issue in India

description: Directed by Jack Schriere, Thunderbolts is a Marvel superhero movie that follows a team of antiheroes. As the team assembles for a deadly mission, these heroes are required to survive the betrayal. The movie will release on Aug 27th, 2025, only on JioHotstar, in multipleLanguages.
title: Thunderbolts OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Marvel Movie Online

description: Tamil OTT releases in August 2025 offer a wide variety of genres, from thrillers (Peranbum Perungobamum) and romcoms (Thalaivan Thalaivii), to action thrillers (Akkenam) and historical dramas (Hari Hara Veera Mallu). Streaming across Aha Tamil, Netflix India, Prime Video, and Jio Hotstar, these movies and shows bring strong performances, emotional depth, comedy, and grand visuals.
title: Top Tamil OTT Releases This Month (August 2025): Peranbum Perungobamum, Thalaivan Thalaivii, Akkenam, and More

description: The top OTT platforms like Netflix, Aha, and Prime Video are set to offer the best content for weekend watching. The top releases include Kothapallilo Okappudu, Sir Madam, Maareesan and more. Viewers can watch these series and movies on the listed platforms.
title: Top Telugu OTT Releases This Month (August 2025): Kothapallilo Okappudu, Constable Kanakam, Maareesan, and More

description: Nintendo is reportedly planning to host a Direct presentation next month featuring upcoming Switch and Switch 2 games. The company hosted a Kirby Air Riders Direct on August 19 and an Indie World showcase earlier this month.
title: A Nintendo Direct Presentation Is Reportedly Planned for September

description: Elon Musk-owned artificial intelligence (AI) startup xAI filed a lawsuit against OpenAI and Apple on Monday. The legal complaint has been registered in the US federal court in Texas, and alleges the two companies of anticompetitive conduct and conspiracy to monopolise the market for smartphones and generative AI chatbots.
title: Elon Musk’s xAI Sues Apple, OpenAI Alleging Anticompetitive Conduct

description: Google will soon require all Android developers to get verified to make their apps available outside of the Play Store. The company said that this would enhance the security of Android devices, as currently users have the option to either sideload the apps onto their phones and tablets or download them directly from the Play Store.
title: Google Will Introduce Compulsory Developer Verification for Sideloaded Android Apps in 2026

description: Realme is gearing up to unveil a new smartphone with a 10,000mAh battery capacity at the 828 Fan Festival on August 27. While most details remain under wraps, the company has teased a key design element of the purported handset. It will feature a built-in cooling fan that might help in thermal management. Apart from this, we also get a first look at the phone’s back panel and one of the colourways it might be sold in.
title: Realme Says Upcoming 15,000mAh Battery Smartphone Will Feature Built-in Cooling Fan

description: Vivo T4 Pro sports a 6.77-inch quad-curved AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and up to 5,000 nits brightness. It runs on a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC with up to 12GB RAM and 256GB storage, shipping with Android 15. The phone offers a 50-megapixel OIS main camera, a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto camera with 3x zoom, and a 32-megapixel front camera. It packs a 6,500mAh battery with 90W charging, has an IP68+IP69 dust and water-resistant build and supports 5G.
title: Vivo T4 Pro Launched in India With 50-Megapixel Periscope Camera, 6,500mAh Battery

description: Vivo V60 Lite has allegedly been spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking site, with the Snapdragon 685 SoC and 8GB RAM. The handset has been listed on the benchmarking platform with the model number V2530. The listing suggests a smartphone with the model number V2530 and the Android 16 operating system.
title: Vivo V60 Lite Listed on Geekbench With Snapdragon 685 SoC, Android 16

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is expected to debut soon globally, including in India. Ahead of its much-anticipated launch, an online retailer had allegedly listed the smartphone ahead of its official unveiling, revealing the price and key specifications of the phone. Unfortunately, the listing has since been removed, but not before a publication spotted it.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Price and Key Specifications Reportedly Listed on Retail Website, Could Launch Soon

description: TCL launched the Z100 Wireless Home Theatre Speaker System in the US, introducing Dolby Atmos FlexConnect for the first time in the country. The feature lets users place speakers freely and relies on automatic calibration to optimise spatial sound. Each speaker costs $399.99 (roughly Rs. 35,100), while bundles such as the Z100 Duo, Trio+, and Quartet+ add more units and optional subwoofers. The 170W RMS system uses NdFeB magnets, silk-dome tweeters, and 1.1.1 channels, and is compatible with TCL’s 2025 QD-Mini LED TVs.
title: TCL Z100 Wireless Home Theatre System Launched With Dolby Atmos FlexConnect: Price, Features

description: Vivo T4 Pro is all set to launch in India later today. Just hours before the official launch, a leak has revealed details about the new T series smartphone. The leak includes official-looking renders of the phone. The Vivo T4 Pro is tipped to come in 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 256GB RAM and storage options.
title: Vivo T4 Pro Official-Looking Renders, Specifications Leaked Hours Ahead of Launch

description: The new retail store is located in Koregaon Park, Kopa, in Pune.
title: Apple Announces Fourth Retail Store in India; Opens in Pune on September 4

description: The iPhone 17 series is expected to go official next month. With the launch on the horizon, the rumour mill has been working overtime to reveal information about the next-generation iPhone models. As per a tipster, the iPhone 17 Pro models, comprising Pro and Pro Max variants, will support reverse wireless charging for the first time. In theory, it might allow Apple users to charge peripherals such as their Apple Watch and AirPods via their smartphone itself.
title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max Tipped to Come With Reverse Wireless Charging Feature

description: Shortly after Apple released iOS 26 Developer Beta 8 for iPhone, the Public Beta 5 update has now followed suit. It arrives alongside iPadOS 26 and similar updates for the iPad and other Apple devices, respectively. The public beta and developer beta updates carry similar changes. As per the tech giant, it has added a recovery assistant to help recover the iPhone in case it does not start normally. There are fixes for several bugs as well.
title: Apple Releases iOS 26 Public Beta 5 Update for iPhone With Fixes for Several Bugs
